messages.message: Hey all! thank you for flagging this @Rosie -- there are a lot of known limitations with our current approach of PDF conversion. Currently we are thinking that we will re-think this feature holistically sometime in H2 and will definitely take this feedback into acct!

Hey PMs, it seems like there are two distinct issues here.
• The kludgy import-from-URL feature, which requires converting to PDF. Great to rethink that process. 
• Separately, I would propose that we please consider adding support for Markdown files (`.md` and `.mdx` specifically). I imagine there's not a much more simple file format we could support.
